name: basic-frontend-starter
description: Easy starter pack for your simple frontend web projects

scripts.watch:sass: node-sass src/sass/main.scss src/css/style.min.css && node-sass src/sass/main.scss src/css/style.min.css -w
scripts.compress:css: node-sass src/css/style.prefix.css src/css/style.css && node-sass src/css/style.prefix.css src/css/style.min.css --output-style compressed
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:css && parcel build src/index.html --public-url ./
